long_description: Pack for a picnic in the park or keep post-hike snacks fresh and ready for your return in the 7 qt. Stanley Adventure Cooler. Portable cooler holds the eqivalent of 9 cans in its 7 qt. capacity and is great for drinks and snacks. Stainless steel and polypropylene construction is durable and easy to clean; sturdy latches and hinges are built to withstand heavy use. Lid is insulated with extra foam to keep contents cold up to 38% longer than standard coolers. Stanley 7 qt. Adventure Cooler includes an external bungee cord to secure Stanley bottles or mugs (sold separately). Cooler measures 14 x 14 x 9 in.
short_description: Pack for a picnic in the park or keep post-hike snacks fresh and ready for your return in the 7 qt. Stanley Adventure Cooler.
